channel.title: How Not To Dev - code-smells
channel.description: Exposing anti-patterns, architectural mistakes, and badly written code — so you know what not to do.

item.title: Dirty Code Anti-Patterns: What Bad Code Actually Looks Like
item.author: Unknown
item.description: Writing clean code isn’t just about making your code work—it’s about making it understandable, maintainable, and a joy to work with. Here are the essential principles every developer should internalize.
